description: Stylesheet for the web-based Tic Tac Toe game's frontend, defining layout, colors, and responsive design for various components.

classes.name: app
classes.description: Main container for the application, providing top-level styling, including height and layout.

classes.name: title
classes.description: Styling for the title of the game, setting colors, font size, and alignment.

classes.name: game
classes.description: Container for the game UI that organizes child elements using flexbox.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styling for the status display of the game, including font size and background settings.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe board, with defined columns and styles.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for individual squares in the Tic Tac Toe board, including hover effects.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Flex container for the game controls with gap between elements.

classes.name: button
classes.description: Base styling for the buttons used in the game, including padding and transition effects.

classes.name: winner-message
classes.description: Styling for the message indicating the game winner, with animation effects.
